title: Arabic 42
text: Humble thyself before Me, that I may graciously visit thee. Arise for the triumph of My cause, that while yet on earth thou mayest obtain the victory.

prev.title: Arabic 41
prev.text: Magnify My cause that I may reveal unto thee the mysteries of My greatness and shine upon thee with the light of eternity.

next.title: Arabic 43
next.text: Make mention of Me on My earth, that in My heaven I may remember thee, thus shall Mine eyes and thine be solaced.
